name: National Geographic The Ultimate Hiker's Gear Guide 2nd Edition
categories: The Ultimate Hiker's Gear Guide 2nd Edition
description: Learn exactly what you need to carry – both on your back and between your ears – for backpacking and hiking trips. The author, a supreme long-distance hiker, shares his knowledge about clothing, footwear, backpacks, shelter, sleep systems, foot care, and hiking efficiency. Includes useful information for first-time backpackers, weekend warriors, or seasoned long-distance trekkers.
